mapper.select: select o.order_number, op.order_status, op.claim_status, p.payment_date, pr.product_name, pc.color, op.size, op.quantity, o.total_payment_amount, o.all_payment, o.order_name, o.order_id, o.recipient_name, di.delivery_process_date, o.order_contact, o.postal_code, o.address, o.detailed_address from order_products op inner join orders o on op.order_id = o.order_id left join delivery_info di on op.delivery_id = di.delivery_id left join payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id inner join products pr on op.product_id = pr.product_id inner join product_colors pc on pc.product_id = pr.product_id order by op.order_product_id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

select count(*) from order_products op inner join orders o on op.order_id = o.order_id left join delivery_info di on op.delivery_id = di.delivery_id left join payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id inner join products pr on op.product_id = pr.product_id inner join product_colors pc on pc.product_id = pr.product_id
